comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

Website or app doesn't work properly

Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Desktop

https://www.nibleycity.com/

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body: Согласно первому посту, установите наш скрипт.

# Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

# What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

# What issue is being fixed?

## Enter the issue address

- https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/weekday
- https://m.webtoons.com/en/
- https://m.webtoons.com/episodeList?titleNo=1798

## Add your comment and screenshots

### How to reproduce
#### m.webtoons.com

1. Visit [here](https://m.webtoons.com/en/).
2. Click one of highlighted elements:

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2022-06-18 08-50-05](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/174430745-b779095e-3441-49cb-8cfc-8b1695c2e4c9.png)

</details>

3. Check the network log.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2022-06-18 08-46-53](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/174430801-739756ec-5896-4414-8bff-40c2736d3d7e.png)

</details>

#### novel.naver.com

1. Visit [here](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/weekday).
2. Click one of highlighted elements:

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2022-06-18 08-50-22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/174430889-fbf12b5b-36d9-4c3f-8d2b-d545029e62b3.png)


</details>

3. Check the network log.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2022-06-18 08-45-11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/174430898-53aa14d0-9e82-4754-bbf5-87e08c45aba5.png)


</details>

### Related PRs and Issue

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/69674
- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/97015
- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/119488

Do prawidłowego działania strona wymaga zaakceptowania komunikatu o ciasteczkach.
Dodaj proszę tę regułę do reguł użytkownika:
```
al.to,x-kom.pl#%#(function(){if(!document.cookie.includes("trackingPermissionConsentsValue=")){var a=encodeURIComponent('"cookies_analytics":false,"cookies_personalization":false,"cookies_advertisement":false');document.cookie="trackingPermissionConsentsValue={"+a+"}; path=/;"}}) ();
```

issue.title: userscirpt: @match works excessively
issue.body:
@kairi003 commented on [Wed Jun 01 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/4181)

### Issue Details

Without wildcards, `@match` as userscript attributes should match the specified pathname exactly, but it will be a forward match.

- **AdGuard version:**
  - v3.6.8 (46)
- **Filtering mode:**
  - Local VPN
- **Device:**
  - Galaxy s8 (SCV36)
- **Operating system and version:**
  - Android 9
- **Root access:**
  - No

### Expected Behavior

The following userscript changes the background color of `https://kb.adguard.com/en` only.
In fact, it works that way in Tampermonkey.

```js
// ==UserScript==
// @name         test
// @match        https://kb.adguard.com/en
// ==/UserScript==

document.body.style='background-color:lightcyan';
```

### Actual Behavior

It would also apply to paths that forward match the URL, e.g., `https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-ad-filters`.
This is the expected behavior for `https://kb.adguard.com/en*`.

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![Screenshot_20220601-163607_Chrome](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24368162/171352380-1fa88386-42f2-4de2-bee4-1c7d3476669a.jpg)

</details>

comment.body:
Hm. I see metrics.brightcove.com which is not blocked...


Please test this rules one by one:
* `||ssaimanifest.prod.boltdns.net/playback/*.vmap$domain=watchit.com`
* `||ssaimanifest.prod.boltdns.net/playback/*.vmap$xmlhttprequest,domain=watchit.com` 
* `||ssaimanifest.prod.boltdns.net/playback/*.vmap$xmlhttprequest,redirect=noopvmap-1.0,domain=watchit.com`

issue.body:
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings.

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
In this case, we need some detailed logs to troubleshoot your problem. Could you please record them for us? Here is an instruction:

- In AdGuard, head to Settings → Advanced → Logging level → Record everything
- Reproduce the issue and remember the time when it happened
- Head back to Settings → Advanced → Export logs and system info
- Save an archive, send it to us and tell the time the issue happened
- Set the logging level back to Default

Please export logs and send them to support@adguard.com w/ the following subject:

`https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/121788`

I will close the task here and will be looking forward to an email from you.

issue.body:
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings.

---

Browser extension users should to install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: userscirpt: @match works excessively
issue.body:
@kairi003 commented on [Wed Jun 01 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/4181)

### Issue Details

Without wildcards, `@match` as userscript attributes should match the specified pathname exactly, but it will be a forward match.

- **AdGuard version:**
  - v3.6.8 (46)
- **Filtering mode:**
  - Local VPN
- **Device:**
  - Galaxy s8 (SCV36)
- **Operating system and version:**
  - Android 9
- **Root access:**
  - No

### Expected Behavior

The following userscript changes the background color of `https://kb.adguard.com/en` only.
In fact, it works that way in Tampermonkey.

```js
// ==UserScript==
// @name         test
// @match        https://kb.adguard.com/en
// ==/UserScript==

document.body.style='background-color:lightcyan';
```

### Actual Behavior

It would also apply to paths that forward match the URL, e.g., `https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-ad-filters`.
This is the expected behavior for `https://kb.adguard.com/en*`.

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![Screenshot_20220601-163607_Chrome](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24368162/171352380-1fa88386-42f2-4de2-bee4-1c7d3476669a.jpg)

</details>

comment.body: @kairi003 it will be handled here https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1650.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

AdGuard DNS

DNS

Website or app doesn't work properly

Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Desktop

https://www.nibleycity.com/

AdGuard DNS filter

_No response_

Local City website erroneously blocked by Adguard DNS family filter</comments>

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://yandex.ru/search](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyandex.ru%2Fsearch) ### Comment Username: @Yaneche > Блокируется поиск яндекса в хроме. По логам определил, что проблема вот в этом фильтре: > ||yandex.ru^$app=com.avito.android > С выключенным adguard всё работает, в т.ч. некоторое время и после включения adguard снова. Попробовал адрес поиска добавить в пользовательское правило (на скрине второе правило), не помогло. Если вышеуказанное правило добавить в пользовательское (на скрине правило первое), то поиск работает, но в авито, естественно, вся реклама присутствует. > Как исправить ситуацию? ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Do not close AdGuard window 30-60 seconds.

```
karnaval.com##+js(set, adblock_active, false)
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
For user filter:
```
cmpv2.standard.co.uk,cmpv2.independent.co.uk#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.location.href.includes("consentUUID")){var g=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('.message-component > button[title^="Agree" i]');b&&(g.disconnect(),b.click())});g.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){g.disconnect()},1E4)}});
```
or import https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/14.txt as custom trusted filter.
